description.original: Automatically or manually generates Unique IDs (UIDs) for notes and registers them in metadata (frontmatter).
description.translation: Automatically or manually generates Unique IDs (UIDs) for notes and registers them in metadata (frontmatter).

dict..setDesc('The name of the key for the UI: .setDesc('frontmatter中UID的密钥名称（例如，“UID”、“id”）。没有空格。')
dict..setDesc(\"Generate UIDs only for notes: .setDesc("仅为此文件夹（及其子文件夹）中的笔记生成UID。")
dict..setDesc(\"Folders excluded from automat: .setDesc("从自动UID生成中排除的文件夹。单击按钮进行管理。")
dict..setDesc(`Manually scan notes based on t: .setDesc(`根据上述当前的“生成范围”和“排除文件夹”设置手动扫描笔记。将${this.plugin.settings.uidKey}添加到任何尚未添加的适用笔记中。对于大型保险库来说，这可能需要时间。`)
dict..setDesc(\"Format string used when copyi: .setDesc("复制标题和UID时使用的格式字符串，UID存在。")
.setDesc("复制时使用的格式字符串，但注释没有UID。")
dict..setDesc(\"Specify the vault path to rem: .setDesc("指定vault路径以从中的注释中删除UID。")
dict..setDesc(`WARNING: This permanently remo: .setDesc(`警告：这将从指定文件夹/子文件夹中的笔记中永久删除“${This.plugin.settings.uidKey}”元数据，并暂时禁用自动生成。`)
dict..setTooltip(\"Scan and add missing UIDs: .setTooltip("扫描并添加关于范围/排除的缺失UID")
dict..createEl(\"p\",{text:`Are you sure you: .createEl("p“，{text:`您确定要从文件夹”${this.folderPath}中的所有笔记中删除“${this.uidKey}”元数据属性吗" and its subfolders?`})
dict..createEl(\"p\",{text:\"Add or remove fo: .createEl("p”，{text:“在自动UID生成排除列表中添加或删除文件夹。"})
dict..createEl(\"p\",{text:`Automatically add: .createEl("p",{text:`Automatically add a ${this.plugin.settings.uidKey} to notes when they are created or opened, if they don't already have one.`})
dict..createEl(\"p\",{text:\"Define the forma: .createEl("p”，{text:“使用占位符定义复制文本的格式：{title}，{uid}，{uidKey}。"})
